text: is the capital city of Tokushima Prefecture in Japan.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2005). "Tokushima prefecture" in Japan Encyclopedia, p. 980. Tokushima is on Shikoku island at the mouth of the Yoshino River.Nussbaum, "Tokushima" at p. 980. ==History== Tokushima is a former castle town (joka-machi) of the Hachisuka clan. ===Timeline=== * 1586 – Castle build by Hachisuka * 1889 – Modern city created * 1945 - Most of the city is destroyed by US bombers ==References== == Other websites == * http://www.city.tokushima.tokushima.jp/english/index.html ; * Category:Cities in Tokushima Prefecture
title: Tokushima (city)
